figure.figDesc:
The Department of Education and Science in Ireland has recently drawn up a set of planning and
design guidelines for learning spaces for pupils with special educational needs in mainstream primary
and post primary schools.
The document entitled " Planning & Design Guidelines for Accommodation for Pupils with Special
Educational Needs in Primary & Post Primary Schools " (Technical Guidance Document 026) will
shortly be published on the Department's website at www.education.ie.
